title: Client stopped functionning after agreeing to enter a game
body:
Hello, I want ask about a problem that's been occuring to me lately I'd say since 6.13.
From times to times when I click "I agree" in order to enter a game, the client suddenly fails to respond and then closes resulting to queue dodge and lp loss.
Is there any thing to do to prevent this from happening?

replies.body: It sounds like you may be experiencing an issue with your computer preventing you from joining the game lobby, essentially leaving you behind.  I suggest going through our[ Troubleshooting Connection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to fix this for good and get you back in the game. I hope that helps!
